txt.en: You have encountered a band of volatile goblin riders led by Kramp stalking the crofts outside Snowbourn.
With Kramp and his warband defeated, Fastred and the crofters of Snowbourn can rest more easily.
You have discovered a roving warband of goblins led by Kramp in the outskirts of Snowbourn's croftlands. The crofters of Snowbourn would be able to live without fear if this band were to be defeated.
You have discovered a band of volatile goblin riders led by Kramp stalking the crofts outside Snowbourn.
Kramp can be found roaming the crofts outside Snowbourn with his warband.
